text: Manuel António dos Santos (born December 5, 1943 in Mirandela) is a Portuguese politician who served as Member of the European Parliament for the Socialist Party, part of the Party of European Socialists, from 2001 until 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (Portugal) MEPs Category:MEPs for Portugal 2004–2009 Category:MEPs for Portugal 1999–2004 Category:MEPs for Portugal 2014–2019
title: Manuel António dos Santos
